submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: list[int], target: list[int]) -> int:
        diff = [a - b for a, b in zip(nums, target)]
        ans = 0
        n = len(nums)
        i = 0

        def sign(x: int):
            if x > 0:
                return 1
            if x < 0:
                return -1
            return 0

        while i < n:
            if diff[i] == 0:
                i += 1
                continue

            so = sign(diff[i])
            diff[i] *= so
            j = i + 1
            ans += diff[i]
            while j < n and sign(diff[j]) == so:
                diff[j] *= so
                ans += max(diff[j] - diff[j - 1], 0)
                # print(j, ans)
                j += 1
            # print(i, ans)
            i = j

        # print(diff)

        return ans
